2.1.1.name: wordpress/ple-ec3
2.1.1.description:
This PostLists Extension provides orderby options, conditions and placeholders for the events created with Event Calendar 3 to be used for each post within PostLists lists.

The following placeholders can be used, if this plugin is activated: %ec3_shedule% will get replaced to the event calendar start-datetime and the end-datetime of the current post. %ec3_shedule_date% will get replaced to the event calendarstart-date and the end-date. %ec3_shedule_time% will get replaced to the event calendarstart-time and the end-time. %ec3_shedule_start% will get replaced to the event calendarstart-datetime. %ec3_shedule_start_date% will get replaced to the event calendarstart-date. %ec3_shedule_start_time% will get replaced to the event calendarstart-time. %ec3_shedule_end% will get replaced to the event calendarend-datetime. %ec3_shedule_end_date% will get replaced to the event calendarend-date. %ec3_shedule_end_time% will get replaced to the event calendarend-time. Separator i
